name: Shoes off inside, please! It helps us keep the home clean and cozy, especially with little ones crawling around!
Dirty laundry goes in the basket. We've provided a laundry basket for used clothes.
Plant care while you're here. We'd really appreciate it if you could give the houseplants a light watering every other day.
No laundry noise after 9 PM. The washing machine can get pretty loud.
Grill hours: 10 AM - 8 PM only. Feel free to enjoy the barbecue, but for safety and neighborhood peace, please only use it during this time.
Please separate recyclables (plastic, glass, paper) from regular trash. There are clearly labeled bins to help you out.
Cooking is allowed only in designated kitchen areas. No hot plates in bedrooms or hallways.
Do not park in front of neighboring houses.
Quiet hours are serious — please be respectful.
Close balcony doors when it rains.
No frying, please! We've had some issues with lingering cooking smells and oil stains.
Close windows when using AC to help it work efficiently.
Some items in the home are for personal use only (they're labeled). Please don't use them during your stay.
Store food properly. Please don't leave food on counters or outside the fridge — it attracts ants quickly in this climate.
Clean dishes before you go.
No towels on balcony railings. It can be unsightly and unsafe in strong winds.
Leave the furniture as is.
Use coasters on wooden surfaces. We love our vintage wood furniture, and we hope you do too.
Toilets are for toilet paper only. Please don't flush anything besides toilet paper — no wet wipes, cotton pads, or hygiene products!
Hair dyeing not allowed in bathrooms.
Turn off AC when not in use.
Please don't climb or lean on the balcony railing.
Eco-soaps only in the outdoor shower. To protect the natural drainage and our plants, we kindly ask guests to use only biodegradable soaps in the outdoor shower.
No open flames indoors. For safety reasons, we don't allow candles, incense, or any open flames inside.
Windows closed before check-out.
Lock up when you head out.
Lights out after midnight.
